results.t: How many federal holidays are there? Key dates for 2024
results.p: May 25, 2024 — Each year, there are 11 federal holidays in the US. If you work in the Washington DC metropolitan area, you get an additional holiday every four years.
Monday, January 1, 2024, New Year's Day. Monday, January 15, 2024, Birthday of Martin Luther King, Jr. Monday, February 19, 2024*, Washington's Birthday.
